review: Its a good media player and offers most of the apps you would expect as well as of course Amazons own movie service for Prime members. I preordered for the $20 and I think it was a good buy but not great. For the speed and variety of services I just think other options do it better.  I have high expectation of Amazon products and I think this still has a lot going for it and potential to be better as features and services are added, but as it stands it just doesn't stand strong enough amongst the competition.If you're an Amazon prime member then this is still a decent buy, but I think it is worth it to pay more and get something that already has all of the features this doesn't as of this review.  I will update this review should I find reason to.
author: I Like Stuff
